name: Blue Poppy
uniqueFact: It is known for its intense blue petals and is often found at high altitudes.

name: Corpse Flower
uniqueFact: One of the world's largest and rarest flowers, it emits a strong odor of decaying flesh when it blooms.

name: Chocolate Cosmos
uniqueFact: These flowers have a rich, chocolate-like scent and are deep red, resembling the color of cocoa.

name: Jade Vine
uniqueFact: Known for its spectacular, claw-shaped flowers, the color of which is a rare shade in the plant kingdom.

name: Black Bat Flower
uniqueFact: This flower is distinctive for its black color and large size, with long 'whiskers' that can grow up to 28 inches.
